mapper.sql: t.ID, t.CULPRIT_ID, t.GROUP_ID, t.FILING_ORG, t.FILING_DATE, t.HANDLING_PERSON, t.SFS_HANDLING_PERSON, t.SFS_CONTACT, t.DIC_BBZT_KEY, t.FILING_REASON, t.ORG_OPINION, t.FG_ACCOUNT_NAME, t.FILL_FORM_DATE, t.NOTE, t.FILL_START_DATE, t.FILL_END_DATE, t.PERSON_ID, t.PATH, t.PATH_NAME, t.DIC_FILING_TYPE_KEY, t.JZK_OPINION, t.DIC_IS_COLLECT_KEY, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG,t.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, t.CEDENTIALS_NUMBER,t.DIC_ZJLXKEY
mapper.insert: insert into SF_EXIT_ENTRY_REPORT (ID, CULPRIT_ID, GROUP_ID, FILING_ORG, FILING_DATE, HANDLING_PERSON, SFS_HANDLING_PERSON, SFS_CONTACT, DIC_BBZT_KEY, FILING_REASON, ORG_OPINION, FG_ACCOUNT_NAME, FILL_FORM_DATE, NOTE, FILL_START_DATE, FILL_END_DATE, PERSON_ID, PATH, PATH_NAME, DIC_FILING_TYPE_KEY, JZK_OPINION, DIC_IS_COLLECT_KEY, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG,PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,CEDENTIALS_NUMBER,DIC_ZJLXKEY ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filingOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{handlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfsHandlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfsContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicBbztKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filingReason,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{orgOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{fgAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fillFormDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{fillStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fillEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicFilingTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzkOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{dicIsCollectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cedentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{dicZjlxKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SF_EXIT_ENTRY_REPORT
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILING_ORG = #{filingOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILING_DATE = #{filingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HANDLING_PERSON = #{handlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFS_HANDLING_PERSON = #{sfsHandlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFS_CONTACT = #{sfsContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_BBZT_KEY = #{dicBbztKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILING_REASON = #{filingReason,jdbcType=CLOB},
ORG_OPINION = #{orgOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
FG_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{fgAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILL_FORM_DATE = #{fillFormDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB},
FILL_START_DATE = #{fillStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FILL_END_DATE = #{fillEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_FILING_TYPE_KEY = #{dicFilingTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JZK_OPINION = #{jzkOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
DIC_IS_COLLECT_KEY = #{dicIsCollectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CEDENTIALS_NUMBER = #{cedentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_ZJLXKEY = #{dicZjlxKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_EXIT_ENTRY_REPORT set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILING_ORG = #{filingOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILING_DATE = #{filingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HANDLING_PERSON = #{handlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFS_HANDLING_PERSON = #{sfsHandlingPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFS_CONTACT = #{sfsContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_BBZT_KEY = #{dicBbztKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILING_REASON = #{filingReason,jdbcType=CLOB}, ORG_OPINION = #{orgOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, FG_ACCOUNT_NAME = #{fgAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILL_FORM_DATE = #{fillFormDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB}, FILL_START_DATE = #{fillStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILL_END_DATE = #{fillEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH_NAME = #{pathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_FILING_TYPE_KEY = #{dicFilingTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZK_OPINION = #{jzkOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB}, DIC_IS_COLLECT_KEY = #{dicIsCollectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CEDENTIALS_NUMBER = #{cedentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_ZJLXKEY = #{dicZjlxKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ,
t2.name as culprit_name,t3.name as group_name from SF_EXIT_ENTRY_REPORT t,SF_CULPRIT t2 , sys_group t3
t.CULPRIT_ID=t2.id and t2.group_id=t3.id
order by ${orderStr}

sql.if: AND t.group_id in (select id from sys_group start with id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id=parent_id)
